phrases.pCn: 获得信息；索取资料或合同

remMethod.val: ob(附近) ＋ tain(拿住) → 触手可及的 → 获得

trans.tranCn: 通用， 流行； 存在
trans.tranOther: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work
